k=2
> sort(dis, decreasing = T)

3.686092 3.290708 2.915521 2.915521 2.858245

> # clustering
> db <- dbscan(water_scale, eps=2.517006, MinPts=3)
> db
dbscan Pts=15 MinPts=3 eps=2.517006
       0 1 2 3
border 1 0 2 2
seed   0 3 6 1
total  1 3 8 3
> db$cluster
 [1] 2 1 0 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 3 2 3 2 3
--> noise : 2007
